cards.flavor: 「只要我没有倒下，你的理想也将屹立不摇。」
cards.name: Bastion Protector

cards.text: Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have indestructible.

Flying

cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker he or she controls. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

cards.text:
Vigilance

When Kalemne's Captain becomes monstrous, exile all artifacts and enchantments.

cards.text: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

Enchant creature

cards.originalText: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌。由任一对手将它们分成两堆。将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆置入你的坟墓场。
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: 「这是个神圣任务。贝连大师的信任值得我为他终生效命。」
cards.name: Jace's Archivist
cards.originalText: {U}，{T}：每位牌手弃掉手牌，然后各抓若干牌，其数量等同于牌手中以此法弃牌的最多数量。
cards.originalType: 生物～ — 维多肯／法术师
cards.text: {U}, {T}: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

cards.name: Lone Revenant
cards.originalText: 辟邪（此生物不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）每当独行复灵对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，若你未操控其他生物，则检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Whenever Lone Revenant deals combat damage to a player, if you control no other creatures, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Mulldrifter
cards.originalText: 飞行当漂念精进战场时，抓两张牌。呼魂{2}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的呼魂费用来施放它。若你如此作，当它进战场时便牺牲之。）
cards.text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Mystic Retrieval
cards.originalText: 将目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。返照{2}{R}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用。然后将它放逐。）
cards.text:
Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Ninja of the Deep Hours
cards.originalText: 忍术{1}{U}（{1}{U}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物移回其拥有者手上：将此牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。）每当深夜忍者对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Ninja of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Plaxmanta
cards.originalText: 闪现当护板鳐进战场时，由你操控的生物获得帷幕异能直到回合结束。（它们不能成为咒语或异能的目标。）当护板鳐进战场时，除非施放它时支付过{G}，否则牺牲之。
cards.text:
Flash
When Plaxmanta enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
When Plaxmanta enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {G} was spent to cast it.

cards.name: Preordain
cards.originalText: 占卜2，然后抓一张牌。（占卜2的流程是检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）
cards.text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor: 「我们已经将你的生命精华和多个生物的生命精华同时融合。不用谢我。」～议长柴方

cards.flavor: 「你的约定不能毁弃。但你，倒是可以。」～俄佐立将军阿果托

cards.text:
Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Rite of Replication
cards.originalText: 增幅{5}（你可以在施放此咒语时额外支付{5}。）将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为目标生物之复制品。如果模造仪式已增幅，则改为将五个此类衍生物放进战场。
cards.text:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If Rite of Replication was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.

cards.flavor: 「我给他们的幻梦奇妙无比，让他们舍不得回到清醒的世界。」～人鱼法师加俐得

cards.text: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of his or her library until he or she exiles a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

cards.text: Target player draws X cards.

cards.originalType: 传奇生物～ — 人鱼／法术师

cards.text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

cards.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

Flying

cards.text:

Flying

cards.text:
Flying

cards.originalText: 在你的维持开始时，随机将一张瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，断符魔鬼得+4/+0直到回合结束。
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Comet Storm
cards.originalText: 多重增幅{1}（你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{1}。）选择目标生物或牌手，然后彗星雨每增幅过一次，就选择另一个目标生物或牌手。彗星雨对它们各造成X点伤害。
cards.text:
Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Choose target creature or player, then choose another target creature or player for each time Comet Storm was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.

cards.flavor: 当月亮升起、嗜血欲当头，唯有杀戮才是正事。
cards.name: Curse of the Nightly Hunt
cards.originalText: 结附于牌手由所结附之牌手操控的生物每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。
cards.text:
Enchant player
Creatures enchanted player controls attack each turn if able.

cards.name: Desolation Giant
cards.originalText: 增幅{W}{W}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{W}{W}。）当荒芜巨人进战场时，消灭所有由你操控的其他生物。若它已增幅，则改为消灭所有其他生物。
cards.text:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

cards.flavor: 她的心智一片混乱，其言说却尽皆属实。
cards.name: Desperate Ravings

cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard a card at random.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Disaster Radius
cards.originalText: 从你手上展示一张生物牌，以作为施放灾祸范围的额外费用。灾祸范围向每个由对手操控的生物各造成X点伤害，X为所展示之牌的总法术力费用。
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Disaster Radius, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor: 「你将从我号令～不论你宝贵的神智是否应许。」

cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

cards.flavor: 他们尖叫着掉进断层深处，好像把一堆小石头丢进井里一样。

cards.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

cards.flavor: 「艾维欣已背弃我们！我们一无所有，能拿多少是多少！」
cards.name: Faithless Looting

cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

cards.name: Fumiko the Lowblood
cards.originalText: 卑血芙巳子具有武士道X，X为进行攻击的生物数量。（每当此生物进行阻挡或被阻挡时，它得+X/+X直到回合结束。）由对手操控的生物每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。
cards.originalType: 传奇生物～ — 人类／武士
cards.text:
Fumiko the Lowblood has bushido X, where X is the number of attacking creatures. (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +X/+X until end of turn.)
Creatures your opponents control attack each turn if able.

cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.

cards.flavor: 「没错啦，他们会买很多麦酒；但这些巨人每次光顾过后，我都得把房子重盖一次。」～泰坦酒桶旅店主人拜可
cards.name: Hammerfist Giant

cards.text: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.

cards.name: Hostility
cards.originalText: 敏捷如果由你操控的某咒语将向任一对手造成伤害，则防止该伤害。每以此法防止1点伤害，便将一个3/1红色，具敏捷异能的元素／祭师衍生生物放进战场。当敌意从任何区域置入坟墓场时，将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。
cards.text:
Haste
If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Create a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.flavor: 骑士找到了强大的猎物；龙则找到了早餐，午餐，与晚餐。
cards.name: Hunted Dragon

cards.text:
Flying, haste
When Hunted Dragon enters the battlefield, target opponent creates three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike.

cards.name: Inferno Titan
cards.originalText: {R}：炼狱泰坦得+1/+0直到回合结束。每当炼狱泰坦进战场或攻击时，它对一个，两个或三个目标生物和／或牌手造成共3点伤害，你可以任意分配。
cards.text:
{R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

cards.flavor: 口张如熔岩暴陷，拳舞若天火降临。
cards.name: Magma Giant

cards.text: When Magma Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.flavor: 「你脚踩的大地就是我要拿来对付你的东西，还想往哪逃？」～尼可波拉斯
cards.name: Magmaquake
cards.originalText: 岩浆暴震对每个鹏洛客与每个不具飞行异能的生物各造成X点伤害。
cards.text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.

cards.name: Mizzium Mortars

cards.text:
Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.flavor: 每个波尬都争着要比别人带回更厉害的东西，个个都希望自己的能像寻宝大婶的收获一样出名。
cards.name: Stinkdrinker Daredevil

cards.text: Giant spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

cards.text:
{6}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Stoneshock Giant becomes monstrous, creatures without flying your opponents control can't block this turn.

cards.flavor: 强如瀑布，怒如山崩，慧如狂风。

cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.

cards.flavor: 只要能在面前清一条路，他才不在乎自己风暴带来的灾难。

cards.text: When Thundercloud Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Giants you control to each non-Giant creature.

cards.name: Urza's Rage

Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)

Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If Urza's Rage was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.

cards.flavor: 爆破者的眼中尽是美景。

cards.text:
Destroy target artifact you don't control.
Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

Reach

cards.flavor: 它视雕石刻木为残害身躯。

Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may put a quest counter on Beastmaster Ascension.
As long as Beastmaster Ascension has seven or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +5/+5.

Flash

cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Protection from black
{2}{G}{G}: Chameleon Colossus gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

Evoke {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.text:
If a noncreature permanent under your control was destroyed this turn by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {G} rather than pay Cobra Trap's mana cost.

cards.originalText: 消灭目标永久物。
cards.text: Destroy target permanent.

cards.name: Experiment One
cards.originalText: 进化（每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，若该生物的力量或防御力大于此生物，则在后者上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）从首号实验体上移去两个+1/+1指示物：重生首号实验体。
cards.text:

cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

cards.flavor: 「巨犀兽的吼声破坏力比其足跺还强大。 其震耳巨响带有无法听闻的震动，能让法术器械四分五裂。」～析米克研究纪录

cards.text:
